00025 GoalManager::GoalManager(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg)
00026 :EUROPA::SOLVERS::OpenConditionManager(cfg),
00027  m_cycleCount(0),
00028  m_lastCycle(0) {}

00034 void GoalManager::addFlaw(const EUROPA::TokenId& token){
00035        OpenConditionManager::addFlaw(token);
00036 
00037        if(token->getState()->baseDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::REJECTED)){
00038               debugMsg("GoalManager:addFlaw", token->toString());
00039               m_cycleCount++;
00040        }
00041 }
00042 
00043 void GoalManager::removeFlaw(const EUROPA::TokenId& token){
00044        OpenConditionManager::removeFlaw(token);
00045 
00046        // If the flaw was rejected, come up with a revised solution to get better utility
00047        if(token->isRejected())
00048               m_cycleCount++;
00049 
00050        // If the token is active, remove it from the current solution if present
00051        if(token->isActive()) {
00052               SOLUTION::iterator it = m_currentSolution.begin();
00053               while(it != m_currentSolution.end()){
00054                      EUROPA::TokenId t = *it;
00055                      if(t == token){
00056                             m_currentSolution.erase(it);
00057                             break;
00058                      }
00059                      ++it;
00060               }
00061        }
00062 
00063        // Clear from ommittedTokens
00064        m_ommissions.erase(token);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void GoalManager::handleInitialize(){
00068        OpenConditionManager::handleInitialize();
00069        m_cycleCount++;
00070 }

00075 void GoalManager::generateInitialSolution(){
00076        debugMsg("GoalManager:generateInitialSolution", "Resetting solution");
00077 
00078        m_currentSolution.clear();
00079        m_ommissions.clear();
00080 
00081        // Set the initial conditions since the problem may have moved on
00082        //initializes the startNode as well as assigning default speed
00083        setInitialConditions();
00084 
00085        // The empty solution is the default solution
00086        EUROPA::IteratorId it = OpenConditionManager::createIterator();
00087        while(!it->done()){
00088               EUROPA::TokenId goal = (EUROPA::TokenId) it->next();
00089               checkError(goal->master().isNoId(), goal->toString());
00090               m_currentSolution.push_back(goal);
00091        }
00092 
00093        delete (EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawIterator*) it;
00094 }

00096 EUROPA::edouble GoalManager::computeDistance(const EUROPA::ObjectId& from, const EUROPA::ObjectId& to){
00097        if(from.isNoId())
00098               return 0;
00099 
00100        //checkError(from.isValid() && to.isValid(), "Bad id's");
00101 
00102        // Get source x,y
00103        EUROPA::edouble sourceX = from->getVariable(XPOS)->lastDomain().getSingletonValue();
00104        EUROPA::edouble sourceY = from->getVariable(YPOS)->lastDomain().getSingletonValue();
00105 
00106        // Get dest x,y
00107        EUROPA::edouble destX = to->getVariable(XPOS)->lastDomain().getSingletonValue();
00108        EUROPA::edouble destY = to->getVariable(YPOS)->lastDomain().getSingletonValue();
00109 
00110        return CalcDistanceConstraint::compute(sourceX, sourceY, destX, destY);
00111 }
00112 
00116 bool GoalManager::evaluate(const SOLUTION& s, double& cost, double& utility){
00117        static const unsigned int MAX_PRIORITY = 5;
00118        cost = 0;
00119        utility = 0;
00120        EUROPA::TokenId predecessor;
00121        unsigned int numConflicts(0);
00122 
00123        static const EUROPA::LabelStr INACTIVE("Path.Inactive");
00124        EUROPA::edouble pathLength = 0;
00125        EUROPA::ObjectId currentNode = m_startNode;
00126 
00127        for(SOLUTION::const_iterator it = s.begin(); it != s.end(); ++it){
00128               EUROPA::TokenId candidate = *it;
00129               //checkError(candidate.isId() && candidate->getMaster().isNoId(), candidate->toString());
00130 
00131               // Utility is 10 to the power of the priority
00132               utility += pow(10, (MAX_PRIORITY - getPriority(candidate)));
00133 
00134               // Check if there is a conflict
00135               if(predecessor.isId() && !getPlanDatabase()->getTemporalAdvisor()->canPrecede(predecessor, candidate))
00136                      numConflicts++;
00137 
00138               // Retrieve Variables by parameter name
00139               EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId loc = candidate->getVariable(CONST_LOCATION);
00140               EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId distance = candidate->getVariable(CONST_DISTANCE);
00141               EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId from = candidate->getVariable(CONST_FROM);
00142               EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId to = candidate->getVariable(CONST_TO);
00143 
00144               //checkError(loc.isId() || (from.isId() && to.isId() && distance.isId()) || candidate->getPredicateName() == INACTIVE ,
00145               //"Invalid goal structure for " << candidate->toString());
00146 
00147               if(loc.isId()){
00148                      //checkError(loc->lastDomain().isSingleton(), loc->toString());
00149                      EUROPA::ObjectId nextNode = EUROPA::Entity::getTypedEntity<EUROPA::Object>(loc->lastDomain().getSingletonValue());
00150                      pathLength += computeDistance(currentNode, nextNode);
00151                      currentNode = nextNode;
00152               }
00153               else if(distance.isId()){
00154                      //checkError(from->lastDomain().isSingleton(), from->toString());
00155                      //checkError(to->lastDomain().isSingleton(), to->toString());
00156 
00157                      // Increment path length by distance to the start of the goal
00158                      EUROPA::ObjectId fromNode = EUROPA::Entity::getTypedEntity<EUROPA::Object>(from->lastDomain().getSingletonValue());
00159                      EUROPA::ObjectId toNode = EUROPA::Entity::getTypedEntity<EUROPA::Object>(to->lastDomain().getSingletonValue());
00160                      pathLength += computeDistance(currentNode, fromNode);
00161 
00162                      // Increment path length by internal distance estimation
00163                      pathLength += distance->lastDomain().getLowerBound();
00164                      currentNode = toNode;
00165               }
00166 
00167               predecessor = candidate;
00168        }
00169 
00170        // The use of a fixed multiplier here is a hack. This should be derived from the model and in particular, computed costs
00171        // from input tokens and the path, However, absent this, the constraint is too loose and thus we end up working hard in the search.
00172        cost = (EUROPA::cast_double(pathLength) * 1.30 / m_speed) + (numConflicts * pow(10, MAX_PRIORITY));
00173 
00174        // Finally, feasibility is based on cost being within available budget for time
00175        return cost <= m_timeBudget;
00176 }

00178 std::string GoalManager::toString(const SOLUTION& s){
00179        double cost, utility;
00180        evaluate(s, cost, utility);
00181 
00182        std::stringstream ss;
00183        for(SOLUTION::const_iterator it = s.begin(); it != s.end(); ++it){
00184               EUROPA::TokenId t = *it;
00185               ss << t->getKey() << ":";
00186        }
00187        ss << "(" << cost << "/" << utility << ")";
00188        return ss.str();
00189 }

00202 void GoalManager::selectNeighbor(GoalManager::SOLUTION& s, EUROPA::TokenId& delta){
00203        //checkError(!m_currentSolution.empty() || !m_ommissions.empty(), "There must be something to do");
00204        s = m_currentSolution;
00205        delta = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00206 
00207        // Try insertions - could skip if current solution is infeasible.
00208        for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator it = m_ommissions.begin(); it != m_ommissions.end(); ++it){
00209               EUROPA::TokenId t = *it;
00210               for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= m_currentSolution.size(); i++){
00211                      SOLUTION c = m_currentSolution;
00212                      insert(c, t, i);
00213                      update(s, delta, c, t);
00214               }
00215        }
00216 
00217        // Finally, swap
00218        for(unsigned int i=0; i< m_currentSolution.size(); i++){
00219               for(unsigned int j=i+1; j<m_currentSolution.size(); j++){
00220                      if(i != j){
00221                             SOLUTION c = m_currentSolution;
00222                             swap(c, i, j);
00223                             update(s, delta, c, EUROPA::TokenId::noId());
00224                      }
00225               }
00226        }
00227 
00228        // Try removals
00229        for(SOLUTION::const_iterator it = m_currentSolution.begin(); it != m_currentSolution.end(); ++it){
00230               EUROPA::TokenId t = *it;
00231 
00232               if(t->isActive())
00233                      continue;
00234 
00235               SOLUTION c = m_currentSolution;
00236               remove(c, t);
00237               update(s, delta, c, t);
00238        }
00239 }
00240 
00241 void GoalManager::insert(SOLUTION& s, const EUROPA::TokenId& t, unsigned int pos){
00242        //checkError(pos <= s.size(), pos << " > " << m_currentSolution.size());
00243 
00244        debugMsg("GoalManager:insert", "Inserting " << t->toString() << " at [" << pos << "] in " << toString(s));
00245 
00246        SOLUTION::iterator it = s.begin();
00247        for(unsigned int i=0;i<=pos;i++){
00248               // If we have the insertion point, do it and quit
00249               if (i == pos){
00250                      s.insert(it, t);
00251                      break;
00252               }
00253 
00254               // Otherwise advance
00255               ++it;
00256        }
00257 }
00258 
00259 void GoalManager::swap(SOLUTION& s, unsigned int a, unsigned int b){
00260        debugMsg("GoalManager:swap", "Swapping [" << a << "] and [" << b << "] in " << toString(s));
00261        SOLUTION::iterator it = s.begin();
00262        SOLUTION::iterator it_a = s.begin();
00263        SOLUTION::iterator it_b = s.begin();
00264        EUROPA::TokenId t_a, t_b;
00265        unsigned int i = 0;
00266        unsigned int max_i = std::max(a, b);
00267 
00268        // Compute swap data
00269        while (i <= max_i){
00270               EUROPA::TokenId t = *it;
00271               if (i == a){
00272                      it_a = it;
00273                      t_a = t;
00274               }
00275               else if(i == b){
00276                      it_b = it;
00277                      t_b = t;
00278               }
00279 
00280               i++;
00281               ++it;
00282        }
00283 
00284        checkError(a != b && it_a != it_b && t_a != t_b, "Should be different");
00285 
00286        // Execute swap
00287        it_a = s.erase(it_a);
00288        s.insert(it_a, t_b);
00289        it_b = s.erase(it_b);
00290        s.insert(it_b, t_a);
00291 }
00292 
00293 void GoalManager::remove(SOLUTION& s, const EUROPA::TokenId& t){
00294        debugMsg("GoalManager:remove", "Removing " << t->toString() << " from " << toString(s));
00295        SOLUTION::iterator it = s.begin();
00296        while((*it) != t && it != s.end()) ++it;
00297        //checkError(it != s.end(), "Not found");
00298        s.erase(it);
00299 }
00300 
00301 void GoalManager::update(SOLUTION& s, EUROPA::TokenId& delta, const SOLUTION& c, EUROPA::TokenId t){
00302        debugMsg("GoalManager:update", "Evaluating " << toString(c));
00303        if(compare(c, s) >= 0){
00304               s = c;
00305               delta = t;
00306               debugMsg("GoalManager:update", "Promote " << toString(c));
00307        }
00308 }
00309 
00310 int GoalManager::getPriority(const EUROPA::TokenId& token){
00311        // Slaves take top priority. Cannot be rejected.
00312        if(token->getMaster() == NULL)
00313               return 0;
00314 
00315        // Goals with no priority specified are assumed to be priority 0
00316        EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId p = token->getVariable(CONST_PRIORITY);
00317        if(p.isNoId())
00318               return 0;
00319 
00320        // Now we get the actual priority value
00321        //checkError(p->lastDomain().isSingleton(), p->toString() << " must be set for " << token->toString());
00322 
00323        return EUROPA::cast_int(p->lastDomain().getSingletonValue());
00324 }
00325 
00326 void GoalManager::setInitialConditions(){
00327        // Start time
00328        const EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain& horizon = EUROPA::SOLVERS::HorizonFilter::getHorizon(); // has been changed to HorizonFilter
00329        m_startTime = EUROPA::cast_int(horizon.getLowerBound());
00330        m_timeBudget = EUROPA::cast_int((horizon.getUpperBound() - horizon.getLowerBound()));
00331 
00332        // TODO: Get a more accurate initial position and time
00333        m_startNode = EUROPA::ObjectId::noId();
00334 
00335        // SPEED: Eventually it will be based on each goal
00336        EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId speed = getPlanDatabase()->getGlobalVariable(CONST_SPEED);
00337        //checkError(speed.isValid(), "No " << CONST_SPEED.toString() << ". " << speed);
00338        m_speed = EUROPA::cast_int(speed->lastDomain().getLowerBound());
00339 }

00341 // callback method by the europa to obtain possible token iterator
00342 // allow to return noId iterator.
00343 EUROPA::IteratorId GoalManager::createIterator(){
00344        if(m_lastCycle < m_cycleCount){
00345               generateInitialSolution();
00346 
00347               search(1000);
00348 
00349               m_lastCycle = m_cycleCount;
00350 
00351               // Now we allocate a trivial iterator with just a single goal - the first available inactive token
00352               debugMsg("GoalManager:search", "Solution: " << toString(m_currentSolution));
00353        }
00354 
00355        EUROPA::TokenId nextGoal;
00356        for(SOLUTION::const_iterator it = m_currentSolution.begin(); it != m_currentSolution.end(); ++it){
00357               EUROPA::TokenId t = *it;
00358               if(t->isInactive()){
00359                      nextGoal = t;
00360                      debugMsg("GoalManager:search", "Selecting " << nextGoal->toString() << " in " << toString(m_currentSolution));
00361                      break;
00362               }
00363        }
00364 
00365        return (new GoalManager::Iterator(*this, nextGoal))->getId(); //pass iterator with only one token
00366 }
00367 
00368 void GoalManager::search(int iterations){
00369        // If nothing to be done, quit
00370        if(m_currentSolution.empty() && m_ommissions.empty())
00371               return;
00372 
00373        // Local Search for a max number of iterations
00374        int watchDog(0);
00375        int i(0);
00376        while(i < iterations && watchDog < 5){
00377               // Update counters to handle termination
00378               i++;
00379               watchDog++;
00380 
00381               // Get best neighbor
00382               EUROPA::TokenId delta;
00383               GoalManager::SOLUTION candidate;
00384               selectNeighbor(candidate, delta);
00385 
00386               // In the event that the candidate is the same solution, we have hit the end of exploration unless
00387               // we escape somehow
00388               if(candidate == m_currentSolution)
00389                      break;
00390 
00391               // Promote if not worse. Allos for some exploration
00392               int result = compare(candidate, m_currentSolution);
00393               if(result >= 0){
00394                      // If a token was removed, insert into ommitted token list, and opposite if appended
00395                      if(m_currentSolution.size() > candidate.size())
00396                             m_ommissions.insert(delta);
00397                      else if(m_currentSolution.size() < candidate.size())
00398                             m_ommissions.erase(delta);
00399 
00400                      // Update current solution Values
00401                      m_currentSolution = candidate;
00402 
00403                      // Only pet the watchdog if we have improved the score. This allows us to terminate when
00404                      // we have plateaued
00405                      if(result == 1)
00406                             watchDog = 0;
00407 
00408                      debugMsg("GoalManager:search", "Switching to new solution: " << toString(m_currentSolution));
00409               }
00410               else
00411                      break;
00412        }
00413 }
00414 
00419 int GoalManager::compare(const SOLUTION& s1, const SOLUTION& s2){
00420        bool f1, f2;
00421        double c1, c2, u1, u2;
00422        f1 = evaluate(s1, c1, u1);
00423        f2 = evaluate(s2, c2, u2);
00424 
00425        // Feasibility is dominant.
00426        if(f1 && !f2)
00427               return BETTER;
00428        if(f2 && !f1)
00429               return WORSE;
00430 
00431        // If both infeasible, cost dominates
00432        if(!f1 && !f2 && c1 < c2)
00433               return BETTER;
00434        if(!f1 && !f2 && c1 > c2)
00435               return WORSE;
00436 
00437        // If both feasible, utility dominates
00438        if(f1 && f2 && u1 > u2)
00439               return BETTER;
00440        if(f1 && f2 && u1 < u2)
00441               return WORSE;
00442 
00443        // Finally, a straight comparison
00444        if((u1/c1) > (u2/c2))
00445               return BETTER;
00446        if((u1/c1) < (u2/c2))
00447               return WORSE;
00448        else
00449               return EQUAL;
00450 }

00452 GoalManager::Iterator::Iterator(GoalManager& manager, const EUROPA::TokenId& nextGoal)
00453 : EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawIterator(manager), m_nextGoal(nextGoal){ advance();}

00455 const EUROPA::EntityId GoalManager::Iterator::nextCandidate(){
00456        EUROPA::EntityId nextGoal = (EUROPA::EntityId) m_nextGoal;
00457        m_nextGoal = EUROPA::EntityId::noId();
00458        return nextGoal;
00459 }

00461 // Intersect was here
00462 bool GoalManager::isGoal(const EUROPA::EntityId& entity){
00463        //checkError(TokenId::convertable(entity), "Invalid configuration for " << entity->toString());
00464        EUROPA::TokenId candidate(entity);
00465        static const EUROPA::LabelStr INACTIVE("Path.Inactive");
00466 
00467        // If not rejectable, not a goal
00468        if(!candidate->getState()->baseDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::REJECTED))
00469               return false;
00470 
00471        // Retrieve Variables by parameter name
00472        EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId loc = candidate->getVariable(CONST_LOCATION);
00473        EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId distance = candidate->getVariable(CONST_DISTANCE);
00474        EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId from = candidate->getVariable(CONST_FROM);
00475        EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId to = candidate->getVariable(CONST_TO);
00476 
00477        return loc.isId() || (from.isId() && to.isId() && distance.isId()) || candidate->getPredicateName() == INACTIVE;
00478 }
